dct_title_s: A New map of North America with the West India Islands
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.

Bar scales on map: "Geometrical Miles 60 to a Degree", "British Statute Miles 69 1/2 to a Degree", "French Common Land Leagues 25 to a Degree", "Spanish Leagues 26 3/9 to a Degree", "British & French Marine Leagues 20 to a Degree", "Dutch miles, 15 to a Degree", "Leagues for Measuring a Voyage on the Map".
Includes decorated cartouche and descriptive notes.

Inset maps: A particular map of Baffin and Hudson's Bay. Scale [ca. 1:14,000,000] -- The passage by land to California : discovered by Father Eusebius Francis Kino, a Jesuit between the years 1698 and 1701 ... Scale [ca. 1:5,000,000].
Shows settlements, roads, Indigenous peoples, rivers, etc.

Inset maps : [1] A particular map of Baffin and Hudson's Bay -- [2] The passage by land to California, discovered by Father Eusebius Francis Kino a Jesuit: between the Years of 1698 and 1701, before which, and for a considerable time since California has always been described in all Charts & Maps as an Island
